name: Lucky Eggs - Big Win
description:
Play the best FREE merge game every day - 100% risk-free with Lucky Eggs

Easy to play! Easy to win! Lucky Eggs is a puzzle game of merging eggs to win prize.
Tons of rewards! Joyful games! Lucky Eggs gives you a stimulating experience!

How to play
- Drop the same eggs and merge them, you will obtain a Lucky Egg.
- Choose one of the lucky eggs and smash it, then there's a reward for it.
- The more chances you get to smash golden eggs, the more rewards you obtain.
 Feature - One tap and easy control - 1000+ exciting levels. - Beautiful graphics and animation. - Addictive game play. - 50+ various eggs to unlock. 

Download NOW and try your luck every day. Besides, the more you play, the more you win! STOP hesitating and join us! Now it’s your chance to become a millionaire!
 *This game does not cost any real money. *Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Eggs.
